Posts.Content: Feb 10, 2014 08:42AM MamaMarianka wrote: I am learning sooooooo much!  Over the past week I swear I'm a walking dictionary for everything breast!!   Have never heard of tethering BUT will look into it.  I was diagnosed with IDC last Wednesday. I found a lump a month ago that didn't go away after my monthly buddy left.  Things happen so fast that we just educate ourselves and go through it!   I tooo have my doubts at times and think about all of the people I would like to leave nice letters for and some that will be shocked when they read theirs.   Has anyone else gone through IDC????  And if so what were your procedures???
Posts.Title: Found breast tethering while fixing my hair. :o( Spoomsister Roxybabes

Posts.Content: Feb 10, 2014 04:34PM MamaMarianka wrote: DONTTTTT worry!!!  Best thing is to act on it as fast as possible.  I found  a lump last month and now have been for a mammogram...a core biopsy...and Friday going for a node biopsy.  It IS SCAREY but it could ALWAYS be worse.  You will go through thoughts of passing , which I think and hope is normal because I def have those moments!  BUT what I have learned in the past couple of weeks is DON'T WORRY!!!!  There is nothing we can do at this point except eat well and be positive!  I am nervous about Friday because the node biopsy will see if this has spread...regardless it is out of our hands hon ....let's just stay positive and we will come out the other end with knowledge that will inspire others!!!!!!  GOOD LUCKKKK!!!!! Xoxoxoxox
